Rack configurations 485 Figure 12-12 One or two CPC drawers and three PCIe+I/O drawers Important: Configurations with two CPC drawers are delivered with three phase iPDUs. However, for configurations with single CPC drawer, if addition of the second CPC drawer is required, the power infrastructure must be changed to three-phase iPDUs. This is disruptive.
